## useStorage() function

Use storage value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useStorage<T>(key: string, options: UseStorageOptions<T>): UseStorageResult<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | Key of storage item. |
|  options | [UseStorageOptions](./hooks.usestorageoptions.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | Options to interact with storage. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[UseStorageResult](./hooks.usestorageresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;

Value of storage item, and a function to update it.
